file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Event Follow API
  description: Event FollowのRailsのAPI定義
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: "http://localhost:8080"
    description: "local api server"
paths:
  "/api/friendships":
    get:
      description: 指定のユーザーIDのユーザー情報を取得します。
      parameters:
        - name: user_ids
          description: ユーザーIDの配列
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 11111,22222,33333
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      responses:
        '200': 
          description: status 200
          content:
            'application/json':
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  "$ref": "#/components/schemas/user"
        '401':
          description: 認証エラー


  "/api/following_tweets":
    get: 
      description: 指定のイベントIDに対するフォローユーザーのツイート情報を取得する
      parameters:
        - name: event_id
          description: イベントID
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 2
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: status 200
          content:
            'application/json':
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  required:
                    - id
                    - text
                    - tweeted_at
                    - quoted_tweet_id
                    - retweeted_tweet_id
                    - user
                  properties:
                    id: 
                      type: string
                      example: 138888888
                    text:
                      type: string
                      example: もくもく会を開催します
                    tweeted_at:
                      type: string
                      example: "2021-02-11T02:26:35.000Z"
                    quoted_tweet_id:
                      type: string
                      nullable: true
                      example: null
                    retweeted_tweet_id:
                      type: string
                      nullable: true
                      example: null
                    user:
                      "$ref": "#/components/schemas/user"
        '401':
          description: 認証エラー
  "/api/events":
    get:
      description: フォローユーザーが投稿したイベント一覧を取得します。
      parameters:
        - name: page
          description: ページID
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 1
        - name: sort
          description: ソート順
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            example: recent_order
        - name: time
          description: 時間順
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            example: past_8_hours
        - name: friends
          description: 友達順
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            example: one_or_more_friends
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: status 200
          content:
            'application/json':
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/event_info"
        '401':
          description: 認証エラー
                  
  "/api/users":
    delete:
      description: ログインユーザーの退会処理を行ます。
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      responses:
        '204':
          description: 退会処理成功
        '401':
          description: 認証エラー
          
  "/api/sessions":
    post: 
      description: Twitter認証でログイン（新規登録）処理を行ます。
      requestBody:
        "$ref": "#/components/requestBodies/sessionBody"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: status 200
          content:
            'application/json':
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: OK
components:
  schemas:
    session:
      type: object
      required:
        - token
        - access_token
        - access_token_secret
      properties:
        token:
          type: string
          description: Twitter認証のJWTトークン
          example: 11111111
        access_token:
          type: string
          description: Twitter認証のアクセストークン
          example: 22222222
        access_token_secret:
          type: string
          description: Twitter認証のアクセストークンシークレット
          example: 33333333
    user:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - screen_name
        - name
        - profile_image
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          example: 13439343432343
        screen_name:
          type: string
          example: mh_mobiler
        name:
          type: string
          example: mh_mobile
        profile_image:
          type: string
          example: https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1212203727597129729/ET2dFF9i_normal.jpg
    event_info:
      type: object
      required:
        - meta
        - data
      properties:
        meta:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/event_meta"
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            "$ref": "#/components/schemas/event_data"
    event_meta:
      type: object
      required: 
        - current_page
        - prev_page
        - next_page
        - limit_value
        - total_pages
        - total_count
        - event_sort_type
        - time_filter_type
        - friends_filter_type
      properties:
        current_page:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        prev_page:
          type: integer
          nullable: true
          example: null
        next_page:
          type: integer
          nullable: true
          example: null
        limit_value:
          type: integer
          example: 10
        total_pages:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        total_count:
          type: integer
          example: 5
        event_sort_type:
          type: string
          example: friends_number_order
        time_filter_type:
          type: string
          example: past_6_days  
        friends_filter_type:
          type: string
          example: five_or_more_friends
    event_data:
      type: object
      required:
        - event
        - extra
      properties:
        event:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/event_item"
        extra:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/event_extra"
    event_item:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - site_id
        - site_event_id
        - title
        - started_at
        - ended_at
        - banner
        - url
        - description
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          example: 1520
        site_id:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        site_event_id:
          type: integer
          example: 204081
        title:
          type: string
          example: mokumoku.rb
        started_at: 
          type: string
          example: "2021-02-12T23:30:00.000Z"
        ended_at:
          type: string 
          example: "2021-02-13T01:00:00.000Z"
        banner:
          type: string
          example: https://example.com/mokumoku.png
        url:
          type: string
          example: https://example.com/event/204081/
        description:
          type: string
          example: もくもく会を開催します
    event_extra:
      type: object
      required:
        - user_ids
        - friends_number
      properties:
        user_ids:
          type: string
          example: 1111,2222,3333
        friends_number:
          type: integer
          example: 3
  securitySchemes:
    Bearer:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      description: jwt authentication
  requestBodies:
    sessionBody:
      content:
        'application/json':
          schema:
            "$ref": "#/components/schemas/session"
